text: niṅṅaḷ niṅṅaḷuṭe śapathaṅṅaḷe an'yēān'yaṁ catiprayēāgattinuḷḷa mārgamākkikkaḷayarut‌. (islāmil) nilpuṟaccatin śēṣaṁ pādaṁ iṭaṟipēākānuṁ, allāhuvinṟe mārgattil ninn āḷukaḷe taṭaññatu nimittaṁ niṅṅaḷ keṭuti anubhavikkānuṁ at kāraṇamāyittīruṁ. niṅṅaḷkk bhayaṅkaramāya śikṣayuṇṭāyirikkukayuṁ ceyyuṁ
